547550.name: Grab the Bottle Demo
547550.description:
This is a demo version of Grab the Bottle.

Grab the Bottle is a new kind of a puzzle game in which you solve puzzles by stretching your arm through the level. You must grab, pull and drop objects to get to the goal bottle, while trying to avoid hitting walls or anything hazardous. As the concept of the game is something completely new, we decided it's a good idea to give you a free try.

Demo features


  • 6 levels from the final game
  • Vintage comic –style graphics
  • Innovative, new style of puzzle solving
  • Some mechanics are still under development
547550.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
